result.title: Testing error
result.content:
Hello to everyone!

It’s not the first time I’ve noticed comments such as this one:

However everything remains as it is. There is no visible reaction to such problems. Perhaps the administration has no time to read all the comments. But in that case there should be a place in which everyone would be able to throw off reports about bugs. Unfortunately there is not such a place.

At least three people suffered from this problem at the last codeforces round:
User Submission
Coder_404 http://codeforces.com/contest/816/submission/27854137
lovelykiss http://codeforces.com/contest/816/submission/27848374
Jackie_Chen http://codeforces.com/contest/816/submission/27854470

I hope someone from administration will notice this post.
